description:
Fishing Cat suddenly disappeared at least three days ago. Thinking Wolverine`s dad may know something, Bonobono and Chipmunk set out for Wolverine`s house. However, they meet up with Raccoon and Wolverine, find a fallen tree and discover a footprint. With all these side trips, will they ever get there?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: スナドリネコさんがいなくなった
